entry.title: How to Carry the Weight
entry.summary:
Author: tapsandtomes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 128,668Chapters: 36/?Kudos: 244

Summary: Eddie hasn't told Buck about the El Paso job yet, and Buck is furious when he finds out. AKA the infamous 97 Acts Kitchen Fight, and everything that COULD have happened afterward if Buddie were a reality.***Bobby Nash DOES live in this fic. Eventually. We still have to process our grief first.***
